[READ THISS]

[Controls]

PC:

WASD - Move

Shift - Sprint

Space - Jump

L.Control - Crouch

C - Slide

E - Pickup weapon

Q - Drop weapon

ESC - Pause

Joystick (VR):

R1 - Shoot

R2 - Reload

Segitiga - Pickup Weapon

X - Jump

L3 - Sprint

Square - Crouch

Circle - Slide
